idea: TEST TRIBE PRIVATE LIMITED  is proudly India’s Largest Testing Community and has already set a strong Global footprint with 10+ Global Events and thousands of global community members . The Test Tribe is built with a mission to give Testing Craft the glory it deserves, while we co-create Smarter, Prouder, and Confident Testers. idea: Xcool is a platform in the creative & arts space that leverages AI to match learners with teachers based on profile, competence, objectives and skills and other parameters, helping learners find the right teacher for their requirement. Xcool aggregates recognized certification courses from various institutes making it easy for students to find programs as per their requirement. The platform serves as a complete automation solution for teachers to manage & market their profiles, interact with and enrol students, schedule live classes and manage payments. Xcool adopts a Platform approach enabling students and teachers.
name: XCOOL PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Willsoft Technologies Private Limited

idea:
RAKSHITRA GAURDS PVT LTD Is a company which provides security solution with Training & Supply Manpower to various sectors.


We offer professionals, who are motivated to provide complete world-class

and uninterrupted service to our clients. Our personnel is skilled and trained

to keep up with the fast-changing business environment. We provide

seamless, sustainable, trustworthy, feasible, cost-effective, and advanced

security solutions for every sector. We have a team of professionally well-trained and managed manpower with all the most recent and propelled

security instruments.


OUR SERVICES


Security Guard

Bouncer and Bodyguard

Escort Guard

Cash Van Services

Event Security Management

Retail Security

Bank Security

Female Security Services

Personal Security

Office Security

Industrial Security

Residential Security

School Security

Hospital Security

Property Security


Rakshitra Guards is a security company is run by entrepreneurs and

security professionals. We are striving to root ourselves in this

field by incorporating all-around services and by providing clients

value with their money.


With our own training academy we have  well designed training module which have been created by experts which have 2+ Decades of experience of serving in Indian army, Fire Brigade, with good ranks
name: RAKSHITRA GUARDS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
GLOBALBRIDGE LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED is established with the vision to provide Easy, Efficient, and Economical integrated logistics solutions to exporters and Importers.  GLOBALBRIDGE LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED is the result of its founders’ experience, passion, and belief in ethical business practices, where the continuous emphasis is placed on delivering the highest standards of customer satisfaction. At GLOBALBRIDGE LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED we believe in delivering logistical services on time and with safety. We’re a Solutions provider offering a multitude of services to meet your business needs.

Our action plan is simple – identify customer needs, provide timely solutions, measure customer satisfaction, and improve the speed at which services are brought to the customer’s workplace.
name: GLOBALBRIDGE LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
